page.title: 05KILBURN(DERBY)AREA LIFESTYLE
page.content: Evidence of the reason behind ours being labelled the age of technology may be found in most homes. Besides the aforementioned television and video recorders, the majority of families also own a car, sometimes more than one, a refrigerator, freezer, telephone, washing machine and other gadjets such as home computers, microwave ovens and stero units. Many homes are also centrally heated and/or double glazed. Families now have the transport to travel further afield than previosly. Shown by the popularity of forign holidays and numbers visiting places such as Skegness, Blackpool and Alton Towers in a day. Long distance coach travel has also increased to the point where day return trips to London, the Lake District and Wales are becoming popular.
